Title: Thuppakki
Writer: A.R. Murugadoss (dialogue), A.R. Murugadoss (screenplay), A.R. Murugadoss (story)
Actors: Joseph Vijay, Kajal Aggarwal, Vidyut Jammwal, Sathyan
Plot: An army captain is on a mission to track down and destroy a terrorist gang and deactivate the sleeper cells under its command.
